data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Goal! Angers take a 0-1 lead through a well-placed header from Mathias Pereira Lage.
In the minute 1, That's a fine assist from Sada Thioub.
Nimes will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Angers.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Nimes.
In the minute 6, Nimes have a dangerous throw-in.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Zinedine Ferhat hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Nimes!
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Angers at Stade des Costieres.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Nimes.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in Angers.
In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In the minute 13, Nimes have a goal kick.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
At Stade des Costieres, Mathias Pereira Lage has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 17, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thomas Mangani (Angers) gets a yellow card.
Patrick Burner is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 19, Patrick Burner has recovered and rejoins the match in Nimes.
Can Nimes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Angers's half?
Throw-in for Nimes close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Nimes drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Frank Schneider signals a Angers throw-in in Nimes's half.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nimes in their own half.
Throw-in for Angers in their own half.
Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Goal! Stephane Bahoken extends Angers's lead to 0-2.
Ismael Traore instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Angers in their own half.
In the minute 25, Angers to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Free kick Nimes.
Nimes are coming forward and Yassine Benrahou gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for Angers at Stade des Costieres.
Angers to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Angers at Stade des Costieres.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Andres Cubas for Nimes drives towards goal at Stade des Costieres. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 32, Frank Schneider signals a Angers throw-in in Nimes's half.
Corner awarded to Angers.
In Nimes Angers attack through Ibrahim Amadou. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 34, Frank Schneider awards Nimes a goal kick.
Mathias Pereira Lage (Angers) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 35, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Angers close to the penalty box.
Angers awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Nimes in the half of Angers.
In the minute 38, Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Angers.
Yassine Benrahou is booked for the home team.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Angers.
Yassine Benrahou (Nimes) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Nimes.
In the minute 43, Nimes have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Nimes to take a throw-in in Angers territory.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nimes.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Frank Schneider has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, The home team replace Karim Aribi with Kevin Denkey.
Throw-in Nimes.
Kevin Denkey (Nimes) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Angers goal kick.
Nimes have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Loick Landre for Nimes gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 49, It's a goal kick for the away team in Nimes.
In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Angers.
In the minute 50, Nimes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Frank Schneider signals a Nimes throw-in in Angers's half.
Angers have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Angers is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Angers.
In the minute 53, Free kick for Angers in the half of Nimes.
Nimes needs to be cautious. Angers have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 54, Ibrahim Amadou (Angers) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 55, Free kick for Angers in their own half.
Lucas Deaux (Nimes) has received a first yellow card.
It's now 0-3 in Nimes as Stephane Bahoken scores for Angers.
In the minute 56, Great play from Ismael Traore to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Angers at Stade des Costieres.
Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
In Nimes Nimes drive forward through Kevin Denkey. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Nimes in the half of Angers.
In the minute 65, Throw-in high up the field for Nimes in Nimes.
In Nimes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Angers in their own half.
In the minute 66, Jerome Arpinon (Nimes) is making a second substitution, with Renaud Ripart replacing Niclas Eliasson.
The home team have replaced Andres Cubas with Moussa Kone. This is the third substitution made today by Jerome Arpinon.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Stephane Moulin is making the team's first substitution at Stade des Costieres with Lois Diony replacing Stephane Bahoken.
Angers make their second substitution with Jimmy Cabot replacing Mathias Pereira Lage.
Angers awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, Angers to take a throw-in in Nimes territory.
Frank Schneider awards the away team a throw-in.
Angers drives forward and Lois Diony gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 74, Corner awarded to Angers.
Frank Schneider signals a Angers throw-in in Nimes's half.
Ball safe as Nimes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Farid El Melali is replacing Sada Thioub for the away team.
In the minute 75, Lassana Coulibaly is on a sub for Ibrahim Amadou for Angers.
Frank Schneider awards Angers a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Nimes in their own half.
Frank Schneider signals a free kick to Nimes.
Lassana Coulibaly (Angers) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 79, Nimes have been awarded a corner by Frank Schneider.
Frank Schneider signals a throw-in for Nimes, close to Angers's area.
An attacking Angers player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 82, Lois Diony smashes in a penalty at Stade des Costieres. The score is now 0-4.
Free kick for Nimes in their own half.
Antonin Bobichon is replacing Thomas Mangani for Angers at Stade des Costieres.
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Nimes.
Renaud Ripart (Nimes) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Angers defenders.
Throw-in for Angers in the half of Nimes.
In the minute 87, Can Angers get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nimes's half?
Angers's Angelo Fulgini gets in a shot on goal at Stade des Costieres. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Can Nimes get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Angers's half?
In the minute 89, Free kick for Angers in the half of Nimes.
Ismael Traore (Angers) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Nimes at Stade des Costieres.
Frank Schneider signals a Nimes throw-in in Angers's half.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Nimes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Angers at Stade des Costieres.
Free kick Nimes.
Zinedine Ferhat (Nimes) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The match has come to a close in Nimes. The final score is 1-5.
Moussa Kone (Nimes) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 1-4.
Zinedine Ferhat with an assist there.
Jimmy Cabot puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 1-5.
Vincent Manceau (Angers) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
